attributes.action: Prioritise supermarket/shop workers for next phase of covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details: We have to work, we have no option to be furloughs and we are at high risk of contracting covid 19 due to the volume of people we are in contact with on a daily basis, we are the unsung heroes and society could not function without us, we deserve to be protected asap
attributes.background: I would like the government to prioritise supermarket/shop workers for phase 2 of the covid vaccine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
